abstract_ssm: The Elm Place Congregational Church records are housed in a single folder and span the period 1864 to 1940. The records include a photo-negative copy of an event program for the church's 1864 dedication ceremony, a program of the church's Sunday School Festival Art Gallery, dated 1868, and handwritten historical notes on the church, circa 1940.
